text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Tokai Teio! ! ! 
It's a duel! !

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Today, Turbo is going to mark Teio! And then 
I'll overtake you at the end! How's that!?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alright then, now lightly…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Listen! Listen to me!

As usual, it was swept away lightly. 
In the midst of all this, the mock race began.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Mark. Mark Teio! 
Mark, mark, mark……

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
(Ugh, so many horse girls around…… there is so 
much other than Teio. Ughhhh ……)

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: ……eng?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ugyaaaaaaaa～～～! 
Ugya gya gya gya gyaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Ohhhhh……!

The venue roars at the overwhelming great escape. 
The gap widened by 5 length, 10 length, and more.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I see, marking Teio is a bluff. 
The real aim is this grea escape! ……eng?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Aaaaa～…….

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Exhausted already!? Just before the 3rd corner!? 
So she just go out of control…

Although it greatly excited the audience…… 
Twin Turbo was defeated by Tokai Teio.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
It's frustrating! frustrating frustrating frustrating ! ! 
It wasn't supposed to be like this～～～!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Turbo can do more! I can run more!!!! I'm out of 
breath, but my legs are still fine! So why!?

I call out to her. The reason for her defeat was 
obvious: "She got caught up in the race." 
It seemed like she could run better with the right advice.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Eh, Trainer… Don't tell me a lecture? 
Even though Turbo is in tatters now～～～.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
No No No! Angry people are scary!! 
Turbo, furious dash!

She ran away. It was more like she was frightened 
than defiant. It was like a ferocious little animal, 
it's hard to deal with…
――And then, one day after a while.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh Trainer. Just a minute. You said you wanted 
to know a little more about Turbo, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Can you come over here? I can show 
you something interesting.

I was getting more and more interested in twin 
turbo. Taken by Nice Nature, where we headed is…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
choice_data_list: under the stairs? What are you doing in the dark?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Video editing. It's that girl hobby. But it look like 
she's just doing it in her free time now…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
People said she also do it for hour in her room. 
Actually… she seems like more of the indoor type.

Amazing concentration. I couldn't imagine that 
from how Twin Turbo usually behave.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
This is Turbo. Brave but cowardly. Outward but 
inward. Motivated but incredibly uneven.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
So the two engines are always in disarray. 
That's why if she can't decide the way to go…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ugyaaaaaaaa～～～! 
Ugya gya gya gya gyaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
She goes out of control right away. 
She doesn't even know which way to go.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's her weakness. 
And……

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Her good point, that's what I think. She is selfish 
and a handful, but I never get tired of watching her. 
She is really interesting.

Overwhelmingly interesting. 
It's not just about personality.

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Ohhhhhh!

It was the same in the race. It was that 
unexpected run that made the audience gasp. 
That unexpected run. If it had stayed that way ……

How exhilarating would it if she could win. 
How much fun would it be for the audience.
